document_data.name: Cashew
document_data.othernames: Krail{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Cashew''', or '''krail''', was a fleshy [[nut]] produced by a tree of the same name.
document_data.Availability:
[[Cashew soup]] was a dish prepared in the cities of [[Waterdeep]] and [[Ormpetarr]] in [[Sespech]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

Cashews were sold by the pound through the famed ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'', priced at 20 [[gold pieces]].
